import React from 'react' import { NavBar } from './NavBar' import { Card } from '../Components/Card' import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' export const Products = () => { const [products,setProducts] = useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ const showProducts = async() => { try{ const res= await fetch('http://localhost:5000/products') const data= await res.json() setProducts(data) } catch(err){ console.log(err) } } showProducts(); }, []) return (
